Description: eyetracker: portETexptBegin item value (port item; actual Eyelink message = values.markerETexpBegin if set)
eyetracker: markerETtrialID format for instrumental trials (201 + 2-digit instruTrialNum + 101)
eyetracker: markerETtrialID format for instrumental quiz/confirm trials (201 + 2-digit instruTrialNum + 301)
eyetracker: markerETtrialID format for pavlovian trials (202 + 2-digit pavTrialNum + 500)
eyetracker: markerETtrialID format for pavlovian quiz trials (202 + 2-digit pavTrialNum + 20)
eyetracker: markerETtrialID format for pavlovian quiz confirm trials (202 + 2-digit pavTrialNum + 301)
eyetracker: markerETtrialID format for PIT trials (203 + 2-digit pitTrialNum + 700)
eyetracker: markerETDisplayOn (instrumental quiz/confirm + pav quiz confirm)
eyetracker: markerETdisplayOff (instrumental quiz/confirm + pav quiz confirm)
